tool_description: Composes customer notification messages for subscription plan changes including emails, in-app notifications, and SMS alerts.

notification_type.description: Type of notification: email, sms, in_app, push

change_type.description: Type of change: price_increase, price_decrease, feature_addition, feature_removal, plan_upgrade

customer_segment.description: Target customer segment: individual, small_business, enterprise

price_change_amount.description: Amount of price change (positive for increase, negative for decrease)

include_opt_out.description: Whether to include opt-out or cancellation options

error_messages: Invalid notification_type: Must be one of [email, sms, in_app, push].
Invalid change_type: Must be one of [price_increase, price_decrease, feature_addition, feature_removal, plan_upgrade].
Invalid customer_segment: Must be one of [individual, small_business, enterprise].
Invalid effective_date: Must be a valid future date in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid tone: Must be one of [formal, friendly, apologetic].
Missing price_change_amount: Required when change_type involves pricing modifications.
usage: Specify notification_type, change_type, customer_segment, and effective_date. Include price_change_amount for pricing changes and adjust tone and opt_out settings as needed.

message_body.description: Main content of the notification message

estimated_length.description: Estimated character count of the complete message
